target_text: Fathom is an app that allows you to record a call and save it to your CRM. Fathom highlights can be used to mark important moments in a call. The app is free and available for iOS and Android devices. Fathom is an app that automatically generates summaries based on the moments you select. You can share the recording and the transcript, or you can share basically your view with all the things you highlighted. Fathom also has a team view. The Slack app allows users to watch a live stream of customer feedback. There is also a button for tech questions that can be pushed within 30 seconds of a customer asking a question. The app is free and available to all users.
